data.name: Demonheart: The Ice Demon
data.detailed_description:
In this otome visual novel, you play as the young witch Shar, who was invited to live with a famous older witch. Shar's host needs protection from the demonic prisoners she keeps beneath her house. As Shar learns more of the house's secrets, she can build a relationship with her host's brother... or one of her prisoners.

Features:

  • Female protagonist.
  • Two separate romance routes with male love interests Esmius (demonspawn) and Sirath (human.)
  • Bonus romantic ending with female human Nissa.
  • This VN expands on the lore of Demonheart, but is a standalone game taking place on a different continent.
  • The game will have partial voice acting.

Characters:


  • Shar - A young witch from a tropical village in El'shei. She inherited her talent from her mother, who was also her teacher. Shar knows a bit about all types of magic, but specializes in healing and protection. She attracts the attention of a more powerful and famous witch, and is invited to live in her household.
  • Eniri - A witch respected in the big city and beyond, she is Shar's host and the mistress of her household. She can’t help herself from conducting dangerous experiments. Strict and merciless toward those she sees as inferior, she will try to teach Shar her views about life, social roles and magic.
  • Esmius - A demonspawn trapped by Eniri and turned into her unwilling servant. He appears to take his imprisonment well, even to the point of joking and teasing others. It feels like he's hiding a deep pain inside, but Shar can't figure out which part of him is a lie.
  • Sirath - The younger brother of the great witch Eniri. As a male, he can't continue the family tradition of witchcraft, but Eniri still has a use for him in the family business - mixing potions. Sirath envies his sister and any other witch, and will keep a close eye on Shar when she joins the household.
  • Nissa - A girl that Shar meets in the marketplace of the big city, Nissa acts like a bit of a rogue. She is quick to decide she wants to be Shar's friend. She will show Shar around the city, share the local gossip, and want to learn everyone's juicy secrets.
  • Zhan - Eniri's family friend, he is a smith who has joined in on the business of selling magic trinkets. He will be there to support Shar as she adapts to her new home. But he doesn't know about all the shady practices going on in his old friend’s house.

data.short_description: Play as the young witch Shar, as she moves in with a famous witch who keeps demonic prisoners in her basement. Will Shar find romance or doom?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: 1.5 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 900 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS 10.9 (64 bit)
  • Processor: 1.5 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 1000 MB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Linux (64 bit)
  • Processor: 1.5 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 900 MB available space
